attributes.action: Recognise the authority of Stoke-on-Trent as an independent State.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stoke on Trent is at the forefront of political change. The City has thrown off the mantle of National Party Government in the local elections but is still forced to adhere to the policies of these parties. By becoming an Independent State Stoke on Trent would be able to run its affairs in a way more suited to the needs of its Citizens.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
